quotes.quote: Run into your unknown.
quotes.author: Becs Gentry

quotes.quote: The miracle isn’t that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: That’s the thing about running: your greatest runs are rarely measured by racing success. They are moments in time when running allows you to see how wonderful your life is.
quotes.author: Kara Goucher

quotes.quote: You didn’t get this far to only go this far.
quotes.author: Ben Alldis

quotes.quote: I don’t run to add days to my life, I run to add life to my days.
quotes.author: Ronald Rook

quotes.quote: Good things come slow—especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: I often hear someone say, ‘I’m not a real runner.’ We are all runners, some just run faster than others. I never met a fake runner.
quotes.author: Bart Yasso

quotes.quote: Your mind is your strongest muscle.
quotes.author: Tunde Oyeneyin

quotes.quote: Run often. Run long. But never outrun your joy of running.
quotes.author: Julie Isphording

quotes.quote: Don’t dream of winning, train for it!
quotes.author: Mo Farah

quotes.quote: In running, it doesn’t matter whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, ‘I have finished.’ There is a lot of satisfaction in that.
quotes.author: Fred Lebow

quotes.quote: Take control of your workout and make the decision to succeed.
quotes.author: Matt Wilpers

quotes.quote: Whether a mile or a marathon, you get there the same way… one step at a time. Such is life.
quotes.author: Baylor Barbee

quotes.quote: The benefits and opportunities of running are available to anyone. You don’t have to be born a natural athlete, and you don’t have to be uniquely gifted. A life-shaping experience is there for the taking, waiting right outside your door.
quotes.author: Donald Buraglio and Michael Dove

quotes.quote: Fight fatigue with focus.
quotes.author: Andy Speer

quotes.quote: We are designed to run, and we increase our chance of daily happiness when we do so.
quotes.author: Jeff Galloway

quotes.quote: It’s very hard in the beginning to understand that the whole idea is not to beat the other runners. Eventually you learn that the competition is against the little voice inside you that wants you to quit.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: I run because it’s so symbolic of life. You have to drive yourself to overcome the obstacles. You might feel that you can’t. But then you find your inner strength, and realize you’re capable of so much more than you thought.
quotes.author: Arthur Blank

quotes.quote: Don’t compare your chapter one with someone else’s chapter six.
quotes.author: Ally Love

quotes.quote: Running is the greatest metaphor for life, because you get out of it what you put into it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Our running shoes have magic in them. The power to transform a bad day into a good day; frustration into speed; self-doubt into confidence; chocolate cake into muscle.
quotes.author: Mina Samuels

quotes.quote: Fast running isn’t forced. You have to relax and let the run come out of you.
quotes.author: Desiree Linden

quotes.quote: You can’t be upset at the results you didn’t get for the work you didn’t do.
quotes.author: Jess Sims

quotes.quote: Never limit where running can take you. I mean that geographically, spiritually, and of course, physically.
quotes.author: Bart Yasso

quotes.quote: What I've learned from running is that the time to push hard is when you're hurting like crazy and you want to give up. … Success is often just around the corner.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: Every run is a work of art, a drawing on each day’s canvas. Some runs are shouts and some runs are whispers. Some runs are eulogies and others celebrations.
quotes.author: Dagny Scott Barrios

quotes.quote: Train smart. Train hard. Have fun!
quotes.author: Matt Wilpers

quotes.quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
quotes.author: Fred DeVito

quotes.quote: We all have bad days and bad workouts, when running gets ugly, when split times seem slow, when you wonder why you started. It will pass.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: You are truly your own hero in running. It is up to you to have the responsibility and self–discipline to get the job done.
quotes.author: Adam Goucher

quotes.quote: I’ve learned that it’s what you do with the miles, rather than how many you’ve run.
quotes.author: Rod DeHaven

quotes.quote: The pain you feel today will show itself as strength tomorrow.
quotes.author: Tunde Oyeneyin

quotes.quote: Mental will is a muscle that needs exercise, just like the muscles of the body.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: It was being a runner that mattered, not how fast or how far I could run. The joy was in the act of running and in the journey, not in the destination.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: If your legs are tired, run with your heart!
quotes.author: Tobias Heinze
